topics.topic: CLSWC1-Was the completed code review checklist attached in the links tab of this work item (Vistway or Tailored)?
CLSWC2-Names/structure in the SW code are identical with the names/structure of design elements. (e.g. SW components, atomic testable units, functions)?
CLSWC3-Unresolved compiler warnings and static analysis issues (MISRA and/or Coverity native checkers) have been assessed for risks?
CLSWR1-Was the completed requirements review checklist (product family specific checks & lessons learned) attached in the links tab of this work item (Vistway or Tailored)?
CLSWR2-Software requirements meet system requirements (functional & non-functional and application parameters) and system architecture?
CLSWR3-Software requirement is feasible for implementation?
CLSWR4-All the related requirements (which are dependent upon the requirements under review) have been considered for impact (e.g. technical risk, conflicting requirements)?
CLSWR5-Software requirements are testable, with associated verification type and verification criteria identified?
CLSWR6-Effects to the operating environment (e.g. memory, CPU/GPU load and operating system) have been considered for design decisions?
CLSWR7-Have all software requirements under review been linked to the relevant systems requirements (upstream traceability)?
CLSWR8-Have all software requirements under review have been linked to the relevant system architectural elements (as applicable)?
CLSWR9-Are all established links correct?
CLSWHLD1-Was the completed HLD review checklist (product family specific checks & lessons learned) attached in the links tab of this work item (Vistway or Tailored)?
CLSWHLD2-The HLD definition (including interfaces & dynamic behavior) meets the related software requirements (both functional & non-functional)?
CLSWHLD3-All software requirements under review have been linked to relevant software components?
CLSWHLD4-All the established links are correct?
CLSWHLD5-Resource consumption objectives (CPU, Memory) are defined for all components?
CLSWDD1-Was the completed DD review checklist attached in the links tab of this work item (Vistway or Tailored)?
CLSWDD2-The detailed design definition (including interfaces, dynamic behavior and interaction between sw components or units) meets the related HLD definition?

CLSWDD3-The defined interfaces of SW components (or ATUs) are capable exchanging and using data across Visteon or Third party components, across defined communication layers, or in multi-ÂµControllers?
CLSWDD4-Criticality has been considered in terms of timing constraints and system impact (especially for safety and security concerning sw components)?
CLSWDD5-SW components (including ATUs) are capable of being tested against design and requirements by simulating required test scenarios?

CLSWDD6-Simplification has been considered by minimizing technical complexity, in meeting architecturally significant requirements by considering: no. of interfaces required, no. design elements required, ease of evolution, ease of modifications?
CLSWDD7-Risks have been identified from the perspective of design not fulfilling expectations at runtime; risks are analyzed and mitigated by including appropriate design considerations?
CLSWDD8-All software requirements under review have been linked to the relevant atomic testable units?
CLSWDD9-All established links are correct?
CLSWDD10-All software detailed desgin have been linked to software architectural design (high level design)?
CLSWUTP1-Was the completed unit test spec. review checklist attached in the links tab of this work item (Vistway or Tailored)?
CLSWUTP2-Test cases cover all functions & dynamic behavior under review described in the detailed design correctly with adequate test coverage?
CLSWUTP3-All functions & dynamic behavior described in the detailed design under review are linked to relevant test cases?
CLSWUTP4-All the established links are correct?
CLSWITP1-Was the completed integration test spec. review checklist (product family specific checks & lessons learned) attached in the links tab of this work item (Vistway or Tailored)?
CLSWITP2-Test cases cover all interfaces & dynamic behavior under review described in the high level design correctly with adequate test coverage?
CLSWITP3-All interfaces & dynamic behavior under review described in the high level design are linked to relevant test cases?
CLSWITP4-All the established links are correct?
CLSWFTP1-Was the completed functional test spec. review checklist (product family specific checks & lessons learned) attached in the links tab of this work item (Vistway or Tailored)?
CLSWFTP2-Test cases cover all software requirements under review correctly with adequate test coverage and consideration of verification criteria?
CLSWFTP3-All software requirements under review are linked to relevant test cases?
CLSWFTP4-All the established links are correct?
